The tuple/rem.hpp header defines a macro that removes the parentheses from a tuple.

Usage

#include <boost/preprocessor/tuple/rem.hpp>

Contents

  • BOOST_PP_TUPLE_REM (v)
  • BOOST_PP_TUPLE_REM_CTOR (v)
